name: ORD_AUD_MAMMO_HORMONES_3
description: This table contains the audit history for the deprecated mammo hormone history.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HORMONES_CUR_TAKING
columns.description: Audit trail column for mammo hormones currently taking (category values). This column has values delimited by "^". The source item is located at MAMMO_HORMONES.CURRENTLY_USING_YN.

columns.name: HORMONES_CUR_TAKING_EXT_VALS
columns.description: Audit trail column for mammo hormones currently taking (external category values). This column has values delimited by "^". The source item is located at MAMMO_HORMONES.CURRENTLY_USING_YN. This column shows the translated external value as of when the column was last extracted.
